website_summaries.verdict: A very inexpensive dish that is wide and low, making it hard for your dog to tip over.
pros: Design that promises to work better for flatter-nosed dogs
Not easy for the dog to tip
Turns eating into a game for your pet
Easily holds two cups of food
cons: The dish has a tendency to slide on hard floors

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: One of my previously starved rescues bolts his food like he's never seen food in days! He'd eat so fast he'd vomit. I was sceptical because the holes aren't deep but they do have a cup to them to make it a little hard. I tried to pull kibble out with my fingers and couldn't get it all in one pull! The dish is only about 3 inches high and about 10 inches square. The dish WILL slide on hard floors. It's not heavy, but is nice quality plastic. I am thinking about buying more for the rest of my 9 dogs! The photo shows a 60lb dog. The dish is loaded with 1/8 can wet and 1 cup dry
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this slow feeder bowl for a few months now, and I am quite pleased with it. My cat has an issue with regurgitation, so I went looking for a slow-feeder bowl that she would like, per her veterinarian's suggestion. It took a while to find the right fit, but this is it. The inside walls are not so steep that she minds putting her head in the bowl, but it still slows her eating, and coupled with elevating the bowl, it has greatly improved her issues with regurgitation. I wash it in the dishwasher and so far no problems with wear and tear. My cat is happy, and I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.KMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl, slows down fast eaters
customer_reviews.text: I have two 65lb dogs that were inhaling their food (1 cup per meal) in like 4 or 5 big bites, sometimes having to cough some up to re-chew. Figured I'd give this bowl a shot, works great. Went from eating their food is about 60 seconds to taking a good 5 minutes or so to really get it all. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: great idea...works!
customer_reviews.text: this really helps slow down my lab! he literally would just swallow his food! we have to feed him about 1/2 cup of food a few times a day, if not, he will just eat it as if it's his last meal! he now has to take a good 1 1/2 minutes to eat. this may not seem like much, but usually in 30 seconds his food is gone! I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for dogs, don't try for wet food for cats
customer_reviews.text: Would probably work great for dogs, but I was trying to use it for a cat and with wet food, at that. He was able to eat from it, but the middle barrier was so high (for him) that he kept hitting his front teeth on it. Again, it's not advertised for cats but in case anyone is considering trying it for that, I would use Our Pet's Durapet slow feeder bowl or a coffee cup turned on its side instead.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for cats
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I own five different types of these slow feeder bowls since I keep being unsatisfied and trying new brands. This was a clear winner because it’s so big (for cats) compared to essentially all other brands. My cats are challenged linking wet food out of here, without it being so difficult as to be sadistic (like with other small bowls made for cats)
customer_reviews.author: soccerstar666

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, solid simple easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Was in need of slow feeder, trusted Amazon basic and I was right Does its job as a slow feeder- Grooves are big enough for an 85lb to slow down eating, but not time consuming like toys Bottom is rubber lined so it moves a little on the floor but not severely Which the bowl scooting is fine bc it's unbreakable, unlike ceramic or glass One thick layer of plastic bowl, nothing to chew on so it's lasted about at least 1yr now? Been wanting another so Gordo get's a new pattern But if not, will still buy from Amazon Basic again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wu

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I do fostering for rescue dogs from shelters. One of our dogs would eat her entire portion of food in under 30 seconds. This bowl increased her feed time to almost 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: LEH

customer_reviews.title: Good for French bulldogs and pugs
customer_reviews.text: I have a French bulldog who will finishes her bowl of food in 12 seconds. It's not healthy for then to eat it soo quickly. This is perfect for Frenchies and pugs becase it's not too deep that it will be super hard for them to get to food. This is a perfect bowl that will slow their eating without frustrating them. I been using this for about 4 years now and I highly recommend it. Super easy to clean. I just put it under hot water from the sink and use a paper towel to scrub and clean.
customer_reviews.author: JIBBY

customer_reviews.title: Does not slow my dog down much!
customer_reviews.text: I have another slow feeder by Outward Hound Fun Feeder (purple) that really slows him down, but the AmazonBasics Dog Slow Feeder Bowl does not work nearly as well. I have two dogs and my boy dog gobbles his food, while my girl dog "dines", and then my boy will try to steal food from her. With the AmazonBasics Dog Slow Feeder Bowl he still finishes before she does. Using the Outward Hound Fun Feeder (purple) he takes 3X longer than she does! I really need something in-between for him.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Hulen

customer_reviews.title: USE IT FOR MY CAT
customer_reviews.text: I have a kitty that basically "inhales" his food in a regular bowl... I purchased this one because it is just deep enough and has many sections to spread his food and thus slows him down! Definitely recommend. Also, it is very wide and has rubber sides which prevents bowl "flipping".
customer_reviews.author: jwinstoday

customer_reviews.title: Cat's and Dog's Best Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Best bowl I've ever purchased for dear cats and dear dogs. My cat who gobbles up meals in 5 seconds it may be a life saver. He now slows down a little but can only take in small amounts at a time. This looks big for cats however it works well for the smallest. AND nothing sticks to it. Washing is easily as the quickest rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel fan

customer_reviews.title: Actually Worked for an English Bulldog!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few different slow feeders, but all of them were too deep for my English Bulldog! With his short snout, he couldn't even reach the food. So, I tried this feeder and it works perfectly! My dog can reach the food, AND it slows him down. Awesome! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats but one has issues eating too fast. This has helped my cat so much! She used to eat too fast and throw up all the time it seemed like but now she only occasionally (very seldom) throws up. It has helped her eat slower so she doesn't get those air bubbles when she eats. I only wish it came in gray or some neutral color as I don't care for the orange but at least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for slowing Dolly down!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl has taken our chihuahua/paillion mix's eating time from about 10 seconds to about a minute. It slows her down, and we have seen a reduction in her after-dinner "horking" that was caused by gorging too fast. Slower eating is safer and more healthy, and this little dealio helped us with that!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bowl, But I Prefer Kibble Dispensing Balls To This...
customer_reviews.text: It works well to slow my hungry 5-month-old Golden Retriever puppy down a bit. He's an enthusiastic eater, always trying to gobble up his kibble in as few gulps as possible, and this does make it a bit more of a challenge. However, it's definitely not a fix-all; I've found that using interactive feeding methods such as kibble dispensing balls work a bit better. This still was a good buy and I would give it 3.5 out of 5 stars; it doesn't stop him from eating fast to the degree I had hoped, but's definitely better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGeekyGirlTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is a substantial, nice thick plastic and has a non-slip ring around the bottom that should stay on the bowl. I have had other bowls of this type that just had 4 little rubber feet that fell off immediately. The bowl is easy to clean. This bowl is for a hyper 10 month old puppy that inhales her food.
customer_reviews.author: Read for Life

customer_reviews.title: Slow Feeder for Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our mini schnauzer puppy is a very quick eater. We saw these somewhere on-line and thought it was a good idea. It works well, and does slow her overall eating time. Easy to clean by hand. It sits well in place on both throw rug and wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Great design & look. Doesn't slow feeding down, but great for other uses.
customer_reviews.text: Really attractive and well built. Good job, Amazon! Unfortunately, doesn't slow my Shiba Inu from gulping down her food. She has a pointy nose and maybe this flatter design is made for flatter faced dogs. What does work for her are the slow feed bowls that are compact with tall spiral maze construction. Still gets 4 stars as I use it to sort pills, coins, nails, screws, etc. Could make for a fun serving dish at a potluck or picnic. Don't know why but it "Sparks Joy" in a Marie Kondo kind of way......
customer_reviews.author: Creative Abundance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our (large) cat!
customer_reviews.text: It has taken us a few tries to find the right slow feeder for our cat, and this is it! Finally something with dividers that he can actually fit his face in and open his mouth enough to get a bite. He has always had issues with eating his food too quickly and then throwing it up, but that hasn't happened since we got this bowl. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Slows down my scarf and barf cat.
customer_reviews.text: After trying a puzzle bowl which was a total waste of money, I bought this bowl. It is way bigger than I need for my cat, but it has totally helped with her scarf and barf eating. The barfing has slowed down considerably. And this bowl is easy to clean. The puzzle bowl was a nightmare and I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandii

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats like he hasn't had a meal in days (despite getting 3/day), so I have to divide his meals into 4ths and wait between servings. I really thought this product would do the trick so that he would be forced to eat more slowly and I wouldn't have to monitor him. If it slowed him down, it wasn't by much, and he soon threw up undigested food.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ledet

customer_reviews.title: Will slow down even the worst wolf.
customer_reviews.text: Slowed down my miniature schnauzer/wolf who eats every meal like it's his last. He would dry heave every meal. Now he at least has to work for it a little. A cup of food has gone from lasting 9 seconds to about 45. It's a start.
customer_reviews.author: J. Binette

customer_reviews.title: Does the job somewhat
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this item is great. However, the pattern leaves something to be desired. My dog has slowed down eating a little bit using this bowl vs a traditional bowl. However, the pattern is not very hard for her to stick her mouth into and suck all the food out of each groove. I think if it had a few more fingers to it that it would be quite a bit better for slowing her down. It is better than noting, but there has to be better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat does it's job but.
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is small. I thought it was too big from some of the reviews but it was too small for my 20lbs dog. I bought the honeycomb bowl and design was clever so I can put portions of his food in each groove but when he licked and pushed the dry kibbles to the sides he has a very hard time eating it and after trying for several minutes he gave up. I had to put his remaining food in his old bowl. Bowl needs to be bigger and less shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl, seems very durable and will not tip ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl, seems very durable and will not tip easily. very deep, holds about 1 cup up to the pattern Have added to my rotation because a hungry dog will master them after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: PvtLarry

customer_reviews.title: Made such a big difference
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my high energy dog who eats like he's never been fed before, haha. The problem with his fast eating is he gets sick right after so this has slowed him down which has helped his stomach. It's so easy to clean and small enough to pack for camping/trips.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are just what I wanted. They separate the food into small quantities for slower consumption. They clean easily and stack nicely. They have a good weight to them so they stay put while my dogs eat.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats too
customer_reviews.text: A good size for multiple cats -- fits just a bit more than (1) 5.5 oz can of wet food, slowing the fast eaters down. A bit large for 1 cat, but it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F.

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever to slow dog dinner time!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little 8 pound dog that loves this bowl1!! I was afraid that it was going to be too big but its perfect. Other bowls with deeper grooves were too frustrating for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good for slowing down eating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat, not a dog. It has seemed to help slow down on his eating, which has helped him not regurgitate what he consumes. Glad I purchased because it’s definitely made a difference for him.
customer_reviews.author: mccard13

customer_reviews.title: Great slow feeder
customer_reviews.text: Great slow feeder! Easily holds 2 cups. I really like the soccer ball pattern. Very sturdy plastic and is just as nice as the Outward Hound brand bowls. I plan on buying more due to the quality construction and the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Dog bowl works okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dog bowl to slow down my "eager eater". It worked fairly well. It slowed her down some, but not quite enough. I ended up purchasing a dog bowl that had a more complex pattern with smaller areas for the food and that worked better.
customer_reviews.author: alm

customer_reviews.title: Slows even the fastest eaters
customer_reviews.text: My dachound is thirteen years old and has been a fast eater all his life. It takes him at most ten minutes to finish while he took three to four minutes to finish eating.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Makes Your Dog Work Harder
customer_reviews.text: It definitely makes the dog work harder for their food. But I will say that our dog HATED IT! Only because he has to work for it but that is the purpose, so this product is great. Amazon WINS AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: PuckGrizzly

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is great! My dog (heeler) takes about 3x as long to eat now! It holds about 1 cup of food in the soccer ball pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Helped a gassy dog
customer_reviews.text: My big dog would eat so fast that it hurt my stomach watching him. He would also be so stinky gassy that he could easily clear out a room. This has slowed his eating down and he isn’t as gassy.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Our dog would scarf down her food so quickly she'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog would scarf down her food so quickly she'd have coughing fits. With this bowl, she has to take her time a bit more and she is eating much more safely. She's able to eat fast enough that she doesn't get frustrated and try to dump her food, but slow enough that I don't have to supervise her for her safety.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulldogs!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped our English bulldog considerably. He is still a puppy and gets excited about eating but he was to the point of choking every time he ate. I looked for weeks for a slow feeder that I knew he could get his smushed face down into to get his food. This works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SLIDES ALL OVER FLOOR BUT SLOWS EATING DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Good bowl BUT it slides all over the floor. My lab has to chase it so I guess that's why it takes longer to eat so not real happy cause I needed a bowl also that doesn't slide all over my kitchen. Just bought this and received last night october 26, 2018. No way to contact them either to ask what bowl wasn't sealed all the way on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Highly helps.
customer_reviews.text: Greatly slowed down my cats eating. I place small portions in each slot. It took the following day to like the dish with some reluctance the first day. I think it entertains them.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be just a cheap, flimsy piece of plastic, but this was actually very sturdy and impressive. My boyfriend's puppy loves to scarf down her food too fast and this was a great way to make her think a little and force her to slow down. She can't easily knock it over or chew on it and it separates the food well. Great price, and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Audders

customer_reviews.title: helps slow your eatter
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has slowed down my pup from gulping her food down as quickly as she did without the maze. She always inhales her food, I do not think she even chews it, just swallows it whole. Now she has to at least get each section cleaned out before she is done.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doxtad

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped slow down my Labrador/Rottweiler! He hasn’t choked on his food since we have been using it. We have the orange tic tax toe bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Muse Thalia

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics Tic-Tac-Toe Dog Slow Feeder Bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for a dog bowl and very high quality, but I use only for dry food because it is a pain to wash every day if wet food is used. This does work to slow the dog's eating habit somewhat, a dog is a dog and will eat how they want to.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. 4 out of 5 stars on effectiveness. I like the large rubber bottom strip opposed to individual rubber feet on other bowls.
customer_reviews.author: HerbGP

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED them! Stupid cats refused to eat out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED them! Stupid cats refused to eat out of them at all! I think it's just a case of my two 16 year old ladies being stubborn and nothing to do with the dishes. I resold them to a home where they could be used...freakin cats...
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Puppy perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Like most puppies my puppy ate way too quickly resulting in heavy hick ups. This bowl does the trick, it makes him eat so much slower and he hardly has hick ups now and he can actually taste his food.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping is a hobby too

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slow him down much
customer_reviews.text: I got this to slow my dog down so that he would not scarf his food so quickly. It did slow him down but not by much at all. My mom got a different one for him that is a spiral and it was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Aquarian32

customer_reviews.title: My fault. I didn't realize how big and clunky ...
customer_reviews.text: My fault. I didn't realize how big and clunky this item was but it is much too large for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle GamblinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Slowed down my fast eater. Less grunting!
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is pretty big but it works great for my dog. Shes an older beagle that inhales her food. With this design, she has to get each peice out of one of the squares. It takes her about 3 times as long to eat but thats a really good thing!
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: works great for wet food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has EPI. Her food is pre-pared wet food. We tried different kids of slow feeder which can be difficult and frustrated for her taking 40 mins to clean up all food. I like this slow feeder bowl using right range of time to slow my dog eating time and fun. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ben Christensen

customer_reviews.title: my dog ate it
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this if your go is a chewer. I got this for foster dog so he would slow down his eating . I did not pick it up and he chewed it up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but this is a very large bowl. it would be for a Labrador, Great Dane, etc..
customer_reviews.author: SheltieGo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend whose dog would not slow down eating - this bowl did the trick she said!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke P.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: slows down a crazy fast eater - hopefully lessens the probability of torsion problems, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Barb H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large breed  puppy.
customer_reviews.text: It really helped my puppy learn how to eat slow. It's a good training tool.
customer_reviews.author: BlueDiamond

customer_reviews.title: Definitely slows my dog down. He's part lab and ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely slows my dog down. He's part lab and he inhales his food. Plus you can't beat the price for this bowl!
customer_reviews.author: kpv

customer_reviews.title: Good balance.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a solution for my dog who eats so fast he makes himself sick. Slows him down plenty but doesn’t make eating miserable. Good balance.
customer_reviews.author: TCU frog

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, takes the dog 2-3x as long to finish his food. Offers some good mental stimulation as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful doggie dish
customer_reviews.text: My chow hound has slowed down her eating from this bowl. Excellent material and easy to clean. Non skid as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with quality. Better than my round aqua one from chain store. Shocked actually. Buying several more, will be easy to stack as opposed to others....
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Okay - good transition to a more serious slow feeder
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale - slows my dogs down but not as effective as other brands. Well made , thick plastic , easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slow them down.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl didn't even begin to slow down my dog, a shepherd lab mix. Pockets are very shallow, bowl is wide. My dog easily went through his food too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Roy

customer_reviews.title: A must for pets who throw up after eating.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is all we needed to keep our kitty from throwing up after she eats. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is large but does the trick for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Worked good to teach the puppy to slow down. It was much larger than expected though so she had to grow in to being able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have another slow feeder and wanted to switch it up a bit for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We have two golden retrievers and one of them eats too fast. This really did the trick. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Verdant Treasures

customer_reviews.title: This works well I have a dane/pit would and would ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well I have a dane/pit would and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Shallow dividers; doesn't slow the dog's eating speed at all
customer_reviews.text: The dividers are so shallow, it doesn't slow the dog down, at all. It takes up a lot of storage space, and does not add any value to a regular dog bowl.
customer_reviews.author: JustMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our Labrottie, Lola, loves her new bowl! She has really learned how to slow her eating and she doesn't knock the bowl out of my hand anymore when I feed her. She has learned a lot of patience with this bowl!
customer_reviews.author: TSqwalk5r

customer_reviews.title: This bowl slowed down our pup's eating speed by about ...
customer_reviews.text: This bowl slowed down our pup's eating speed by about a minute or so. It worked well since the pup is a bulldog with a short flat snout.
customer_reviews.author: N2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large breeds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Basset Hound and Rottweiler who eat too fast and regurgitate their food. Has slowed them considerably at meals, they seem to like the bowls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cmccauley

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. Definitely slows my dog down. Slides all over the floor.

customer_reviews.title: Great dish, could be a little deeper
customer_reviews.text: Great dish, could be a little deeper, fine for puppy but anymore food in the dish it would be above the dividers

customer_reviews.title: Great for any dogs # 1 fan
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this my great Dane half mastiff does great with this will be ordering more

customer_reviews.title: Even eatting can be challenged
customer_reviews.text: We have a Cocker Spaniel who inhales his food , Since we have started using the dish it has slowed him down . I feel less gas .

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, does it's job
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, does it's job. Just too big for my puppy. But we will grow up. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Not good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not appropriate for small dogs though, as they are huge.

customer_reviews.title: Slowed down my puppy
customer_reviews.text: This bowl slowed down my big puppy who was gulping down his food. Nice size for a dog of 70 pounds.

customer_reviews.title: Slow that beast down
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely slowed our dog down from inhaling his food
customer_reviews.author: Brian Christy

customer_reviews.title: It's it work so well once I but the 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's it work so well once I but the 2 cups of dog food on it It cover the slow eating part of it

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy went from eating in 1min to eating in 3+ mins! Works perfectly. Fun game for her!

customer_reviews.text: Husky chewed it up in 1 day. Not really worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Really slowed down my dogs ability for woofing her food.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rubber bottom doesn't keep the bowl from moving. Doesn't slow down eating.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Our vet recommended this bowl and I'm very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy was found in the woods...starving. Still after 2 weeks she is gobbling her food, thinking it's her last meal. This bowl has definitely slowed her down. Our vet recommended this bowl and I'm very happy I bought it. Has slowed her down about 50%. She has gained aboout 5 lbs in 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as deep or sturdy as I would have preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for fast eaters
customer_reviews.text: I have a black labrador who loves her food and this dog bowl has certainly slowed down her eating.

customer_reviews.title: nice product.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what we wanted it to, nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this product! It’s serves it’s purpose and I love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: my dog thought this was not cool trying to slow her eating down she is 12yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog thought this was not cool trying to slow her eating down she is 12yrs old don't think at this point it really matters and it was too big for her
customer_reviews.author: andrew # 666

customer_reviews.title: Way to big that puppy can stand in it. Gaps are too big to be slow feeder.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't slow puppy down at all. It also creates a huge mess because the way it is designed. The puppy can stand in the food bowl while eating. They need to make this much smaller to prevent dog from standing inside. Gaps are gigantic, it didn't slow her down one bit. Returning it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy8

customer_reviews.title: The bowls themselves are good quality, they where even bigger than I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my 2 dogs. They have a habit of eating too fast so I bought these bowls to help with that. The bowls have worked and has slowed down their eating. The bowls themselves are good quality, they where even bigger than I thought they’d be!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M

customer_reviews.title: and I think its a good thing for his belly
customer_reviews.text: It slowed the dinner down, and I think its a good thing for his belly... like it
customer_reviews.author: cina

customer_reviews.title: Ok but larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is nice but a little larger than I thought - guess I didn’t pay attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: GSS

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Dog Pet Slow Feeder Bowl
feature_bullets: Pet food bowl with unique tic-tac-toe design promotes slower eating
Helps prevent bloating, regurgitation, and obesity
50-ounce capacity; can be used with wet food or dry kibble
Made of food-safe plastic (BPA, PVC, and Phthalate free); bright orange color; dishwasher safe
Measures 9.84 by 9.84 by 2.28 inches; backed by an AmazonBasics limited 1-year warranty
